arts.ttl: Aston Villa team news as loan star gets shock Europa League start against Go Ahead Eagles
arts.sum: Manager Unai Emery has made wholesale changes to his Aston Villa team for this afternoon’s Europa League match against Go Ahead Eagles. Villa haven’t made a habit of weakening their line-up in the league phase so far this season but their strength in depth is being put into action in the Netherlands today. arts.ttl: Unai Emery demands ‘disciplined’ display against Go Ahead Eagles
arts.sum: “To get a good result away, it’s necessary to play focused, to play disciplined, to play seriously, and then to play trying to impose our game plan and tactical structure against the opponent. “We have respect for opposing teams in Europe because they usually play very motivated when they are at home They’re going to play here with their supporters and they try to beat us, showing their capacity.

arts.ttl: Go Ahead Eagles v Aston Villa: predicted line-up, team news and match preview
arts.sum: Aston Villa have won both of their European matches this season without conceding a goal. On Thursday, they take on Dutch opposition looking to make it three on the bounce. Villa claimed all six points from a home match against Bologna and an away game against Feyenoord, the latter of which added to the club’s [...] The post Go Ahead Eagles v Aston Villa: predicted line-up, team news and match preview appeared first on AVillaFan.com – Aston Villa Fan Site.

arts.ttl: Go Ahead Eagles v Aston Villa: Netherlands update on weather warning, and match impact
arts.sum: Aston Villa face Go Ahead Eagles in the Europa League on Thursday evening, at a time when Storm Benjamin is expected to be battering areas of north west Europe. It’s not the greatest accident of timing for the UEFA match, but things may work out reasonably well for Aston Villa and their Dutch opponents.
